Reviews.Title: “hotel villa delle Rose”

Reviews.Content: reading reviews look hotel booked available ones beyond budget stayed hotel anyway arrived staff front desk efficient despite age hotel renovation booked family 5 persons 2 adjoining 2 bathrooms found bathrooms clean molds described guests ref moldy chilly refrigeration heater triple reported night fix morning fixed night chilly dec 30 31 able sleep breakfast selection staff friendly staff front desk elderly person helped print boarding pass free gesture whatever lacking hotel

Reviews.Title: “wouldn't stay for vacation”
Reviews.Author: Arie H
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel evening night comfortable staff night helpfull hotel situated near central station night isnt attractive night tour time disapointed 4th floor windows near ceiling water pressure morning hot water complained reception answer cant else complained maybe hot water cold water dripping tap windows tried aircondition didnt feel answer light hotel breakfast price reasonable wont 4th floor

Reviews.Title: “Good location; near train station”
Reviews.Author: ilovebeachgirl
Reviews.Content: hotel looks lovely outside lobby helpful staff free parking limited 4 cars walking distance termini trainbus station arrived air conditioning guess 8 dont air conditioning rest hotel allowed change day air conditioning barely tell hotel staff control setting temperature switched bigger sleep 3 comfortably bathtub 10 stayed italy bathtub rained night unable close windows rain poured drenched carpet fortunately leaving morning somewhat expensive considering quality

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Close To Everything!”
Reviews.Author: Azmir
Reviews.Content: late review satisfied hotel offered unless night shift receptionist whos bit grumpy hotel nice clean bathroom bit close breakfast adequate maybe bit costly whod carry currency lower euros expect rome pal thanks breakfast waiter youve wonderful companion throughout stay delle rose youre wondering im asian guy hot water babys milk read blog trip rome venice

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, great room, good brekkie”
Reviews.Author: KarliReeves
Reviews.Content: happy hotel spacious gorgeous balcony train station 500m hotel hidden street quiet location able walk major sights rome included breakfast buffet style breakfast staff fantastic overall stay recommend stays

Reviews.Title: “Heart of the City Location...Rome is gorgeous...”
Reviews.Author: miggy_2010
Reviews.Content: joined friend ours trip rome hotel perfect location value money clean comfortable pied terre discovering rome opportunity share romantic moments couple wonderful banquets definitely recommend city break rome hotel ideal 3 star option
